name: Monster-Phobia
description:
Monster-Phobia

Escape your worst nightmares in this rogue-like dungeon crawler.

-Multiple powerups to choose from

-Level up your abilities

-Choose your next location

-One final boss

-Death is not the end

Controls

[WASD] - Move

[Arrows] - Shoot

[Space ]- Dash

[Shift] - Blast
